frontmatter.title: Create Social Network by ReactJS
frontmatter.description: Most of the time I have been trying to find a project in real world for ReactJS which support popular libraries and data platforms. I also needed to have a flexible structure to make reusable codes which give me the ability to use same code on React Native for mobile apps.
